datasets.description: Raw appendix tables extracted from multiple pages of the CCA investigative report (2015–2024). Each file corresponds to one page of tabular data extracted from the PDF report. File schemas vary across pages.
datasets.structure_note: Heterogeneous schemas across files; column names and structure vary.
datasets.license: Public NGO report; used for non-commercial academic purposes
datasets.ethical_considerations: Facility-level institutional data only. No personal identifiers. Welfare-sensitive content presented without sensational framing.
datasets.accessibility: Stored in XLSX format. UTF-8 encoding when converted to CSV.

datasets.source: Derived from CCA Report Appendix Tables
datasets.source_url: Internal processing from raw appendix files
datasets.description: Standardized and cleaned dataset created by merging heterogeneous appendix tables into a unified schema. Used as the primary dataset for visualization.
datasets.schema_alignment_method: Column name normalization, species taxonomy standardization, date parsing, duplicate removal.
datasets.license: Derived dataset for academic research use
datasets.ethical_considerations: No individual animal identifiers included. Incident data aggregated where appropriate.

datasets.description: Event-level dataset manually extracted from the CCA report. Includes documented cetacean welfare or injury incidents used in the Arctic Voice dashboard.
datasets.license: Public NGO report; used for non-commercial educational visualization
datasets.ethical_considerations: No personal human data included. Data aggregated at facility level. No individual animal identifiers beyond species.
datasets.accessibility: CSV format, UTF-8 encoding, machine-readable and compatible with Streamlit dashboard.
